channel.title: Phonescape help
channel.description: i need help with gettin my runserver.bat to work i can run through compiler but cant make admins/mods

item.title: Phonescape help
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

Mmmm ,

On what way u do it? Do it on this way :

Go to your client folder -> Characters -> Click the character who u want to make admin/mod

U see like something this :

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = ####
character-password = #############################

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3253
character-posy = 3434
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 
character-lastlogin = 20070420
character-energy = 6
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 402

Now change this line :

character-rights = 0

Change to '0' to some of this numbers :

0 = Normal player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

Read full topic
